rev_rec_notes: Standard SaaS revenue recognition over the service period
use_case_description:
Acme Corp is purchasing an annual SaaS subscription for our cloud platform. The deal includes:

1. Platform License Fee: $12,000/year billed monthly in advance
2. Professional Services: One-time implementation fee of $5,000 billed upon contract signing
3. Premium Support: $2,400/year billed quarterly in advance

The customer wants to start on January 1, 2025. The contract is auto-renewing with 12-month renewal terms.

For revenue recognition:
- Platform License: Ratable over the service period
- Professional Services: Immediate upon booking (no ongoing performance obligations)
- Premium Support: Ratable over the service period
